tql.tql:
SELECT A.created_at as created, A.updated_at as updated, B.full_name, A.number, A.html_url as url, A.state, A.title, A.user.login as author, A.labels, B.name, A.closed_at as completed, A.comments
FROM github.list_issues_for_repo
  AS A 
  JOIN this.list_repos_for_user 
  as B ON A.repo = B.name
  WHERE A.owner=@owner
 AND B.owner=@owner

SELECT * FROM airtable.update_record
  WHERE recordId=@recordID
  AND baseId=@baseID
  AND table=@table
  AND $body=(SELECT {
    'fields' : { 
            'Reference':  @reference,
			'Title':      @title,
			'State':     @state,
			'Author':     @author,
			'Type':       @type,
			'Comments':   @comments,
			'URL':        @url,
			'Updated':    @updated,
			'Created':    @created,
			'Completed':  @completed,
			'Repository': @repo, 
             }
  })

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

operations.description: list all the pull requests for a user

tql.tql:
SELECT * FROM github.list_pull_requests
  AS A 
  JOIN this.list_repos_for_user 
  as B ON A.repo = B.name
  WHERE A.owner=@owner
 AND B.owner=@owner

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

default.text: Personal Repos Pull Requests and Issues

tql.tql:
SELECT id, fields.Reference as reference FROM airtable.get_records
  WHERE baseId=@baseID
  AND table=@table


/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

default.text: Personal Repos Pull Requests and Issues

tql.tql:
SELECT * FROM 
this.get_airtable_records
AS A
JOIN this.get_issues_with_reference 
  as B ON A.reference = B.reference
  WHERE A.baseId=@baseID
  AND A.table=@table
  AND B.owner=@owner

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT name, full_name FROM github.list_repos_for_user
  WHERE username=@owner
  AND type='owner'
  AND fork=false

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM airtable.create_record
  AND baseId=@baseID
  AND table=@table
  AND $body=(SELECT {
    'fields' : { 
            'Reference':  @reference,
			'Title':      @title,
			'State':     @state,
			'Author':     @author,
			'Type':       @type,
			'Comments':   @comments,
			'URL':        @url,
			'Updated':    @updated,
			'Created':    @created,
			'Completed':  @completed,
			'Repository': @repo, 
             }
  })

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

default.text: Personal Repos Pull Requests and Issues
